tripleplay.gesture.Gesture

    Package Description
    tripleplay.gesture  

    • Uses of Gesture in tripleplay.gesture

      Classes in tripleplay.gesture with type parameters of type Gesture 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Gesture<T extends Gesture<T>> 
      Classes in tripleplay.gesture that implement Gesture 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GestureBase<T extends GestureBase<T>>
      A base class for Gestures to extend to get some common functionality.
      class  Swipe
      A simple swipe gesture in a given cardinal direction.
      class  Tap
      A simple touch gesture.
      Methods in tripleplay.gesture that return types with arguments of type Gesture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      react.ValueView<Gesture<?>> GestureDirector.greedyGesture() 
      Methods in tripleplay.gesture with parameters of type Gesture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GestureDirector GestureDirector.add(Gesture<?> gesture)
      Adds a gesture to the set considered during each user interaction.
      boolean GestureDirector.remove(Gesture<?> gesture)
      Removes the given gesture from the set considered during each user interaction.
